text.value:
Thank you for participating in this survey. Your feedback is valuable as it helps to understand employee engagement and the effectiveness of our weekly all-hands meetings. Today, we would like to hear your thoughts on the presentations from the recent meeting where project Thunderbird and Clothiers Box were presented.

### How informative did you find Dave M.'s presentation on project Thunderbird? {#q1}
*Please select an option.*
1. Not informative at all
2. Somewhat informative but lacking details
3. Adequately informative
4. Very informative with good details
5. Exceptionally informative with thorough details and clear explanations
6. Other (please specify)
